# Innovative Aquaculture Solutions

Innovative Aquaculture SolutionsInnovative Aquaculture SolutionsInnovative Aquaculture Solutions

Farm your Fish in ALWAYS Clean Nets

## About Oraseas

![](https://img1.wsimg.com/isteam/ip/3b1b8ee9-78a7-478e-b347-06c5258d86c7/blob-e110302.png/:/cr=t:12.41%25,l:0%25,w:100%25,h:75.19%25/rs=w:600,h:451.12781954887214,cg:true)

#### Our Mission

At Oraseas, we are committed to transforming aquaculture through innovative technology, sustainable practices, and strong partnerships.

Our mission is to empower fish farmers with reliable solutions and comprehensive support, fostering long-term growth, operational excellence, and a more sustainable future for global aquaculture.

## The Autoboss - The Only Autonomous net cleaner

#### Manufacturing BossAqua™

#### Autonomous and Independent

#### Autonomous and Independent

![](https://img1.wsimg.com/isteam/ip/3b1b8ee9-78a7-478e-b347-06c5258d86c7/%CE%91%CF%81%CF%87%CE%B5%CE%B9%CC%81%CE%BF%20%CE%B5%CE%B9%CE%BA%CE%BF%CC%81%CE%BD%CE%B1%CF%82%20WhatsApp%202024-03-01%20%CF%83%CF%84%CE%B9%CF%82%2017.2.jpg/:/cr=t:0%25,l:12.56%25,w:74.88%25,h:100%25/rs=w:388,h:291.72932330827064,cg:true)

The AutoBoss is manufactured in New Zealand.

BossAqua™ specializes in designing and manufacturing advanced net washing equipment for the global aquaculture industry.

Since launching the AutoBoss™ in 2014, BossAqua™ has achieved significant international growth, with over 50 machines operating across six countries.

#### Autonomous and Independent

#### Autonomous and Independent

#### Autonomous and Independent

![](https://img1.wsimg.com/isteam/ip/3b1b8ee9-78a7-478e-b347-06c5258d86c7/PHOTO-2025-01-29-10-24-55.jpg/:/cr=t:21.8%25,l:0%25,w:100%25,h:56.39%25/rs=w:388,h:291.72932330827064,cg:true)

The ONLY effectively autonomous           net-cleaning robot in the market.

Once the AutoBoss is put on the cage a support boat is not necessary as all components are located in the autonomous, floating unit.

The operator focuses on the performance of the cleaner and not on the cleaning of nets.

#### Low Operating Costs

#### Autonomous and Independent

#### Low Operating Costs

![](https://img1.wsimg.com/isteam/ip/3b1b8ee9-78a7-478e-b347-06c5258d86c7/BA%20180223%20RBPHOTO23_9085.jpg/:/cr=t:0%25,l:5.66%25,w:88.68%25,h:100%25/rs=w:388,h:291.72932330827064,cg:true)

The **lowest fuel consumption** of any other

net-cleaning machine

- 11-13 Lt of fuel per hour
- 1 operator per machine
- Reliable

The **highest operating up-time** and

the **lowest maintennace costs**

#### Simple to operate

#### Simple to operate

#### Low Operating Costs

![](https://img1.wsimg.com/isteam/ip/3b1b8ee9-78a7-478e-b347-06c5258d86c7/BA%20180223%20RBPHOTO23_9101.jpg/:/cr=t:19.92%25,l:0%25,w:100%25,h:60.15%25/rs=w:388,h:291.72932330827064,cg:true)

- It needs at most one operator per machine, which, after just one week's training is fully capable to operate it.
- It is light (1 ton) and easy to move from cage to cage and farm to farm.

#### Maintenance

#### Simple to operate

#### High Perfomance

![](https://img1.wsimg.com/isteam/ip/3b1b8ee9-78a7-478e-b347-06c5258d86c7/BA%20180223%20RBPHOTO23_9100.jpg/:/cr=t:12.41%25,l:0%25,w:100%25,h:75.19%25/rs=w:388,h:291.72932330827064,cg:true)

High up-time because of its Unique design

- Resistent and reliable in the toughest marine environment
- Easy and fast access to every part
- Key spare parts kept on site so as to resolve issues immediately and avoid down-time in net cleaning.

#### High Perfomance

#### Simple to operate

#### High Perfomance

![](https://img1.wsimg.com/isteam/ip/3b1b8ee9-78a7-478e-b347-06c5258d86c7/%CE%A3%CF%84%CE%B9%CE%B3%CE%BC%CE%B9%CE%BF%CC%81%CF%84%CF%85%CF%80%CE%BF%20%CE%BF%CE%B8%CE%BF%CC%81%CE%BD%CE%B7%CF%82%202024-03-26%20171601.png/:/cr=t:12.66%25,l:0%25,w:100%25,h:74.67%25/rs=w:388,h:291.72932330827064,cg:true)

MODELS AVAILABLE

The V3 can clean  from 1300-1800m2 / hour. Perfect for small/medium size farms.

The brand new V4 SmartBot cleans from 2100 - 2500m2/ hour and offers advanced automation and connectivity features.

[Learn More](https://www.bossaqua.com/)
